sample_rows.declaration_gi: ACKNOWLEDGEMENT OF GOVERNMENT SUPPORT This invention was made with Government support under Grant no. IIP-1134849, Grant no. 1357419, and Grant no. DGE1110007, awarded by the National Science Foundation. The Government has certain rights in this invention.

ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS This invention was made with government support under funding by the Department of Energy Basic Energy Sciences (DE-FG02-01ER15255) and the National Science Foundation (CTS-0207781). The government may have certain rights in the invention.

CONTRACTUAL ORIGIN OF THE INVENTION The United States Government has rights in this invention under Contract No. DE-AC36-99GO10337 between the U.S. Department of Energy and the National Renewable Energy Laboratory, a division of Midwest Research Institute.

CONTRACTUAL ORIGIN OF THE INVENTION This invention was made with United States Government support under contract number DE-AC07-99ID13727, awarded by the. United States Department of Energy. The United States Government has certain rights in the invention.

CROSS-REFERENCE TO RELATED DOCUMENTS This invention was made with government support under contract F33615-99-C-2961 awarded by the US Army Space and Missile Defense Command. The United States Government may therefore have certain rights to this invention.
